title: Pagani unveils $2.4M, 764-hp Huayra Roadster - Roadshow
text:
Pagani unveils $2.4M, 764-hp Huayra Roadster 
Well, hello . 
This is the Pagani Huayra Roadster, the latest car from Horacio Pagani's namesake manufacturer. Photo by: Pagani 
It's based on the fixed-roof Huayra, but it's actually lighter and stiffer than the coupe. Photo by: Pagani 
Certain exterior parts between the two models differ, like bumper and wheel designs. Photo by: Pagani 
Two fixed roofs are available -- a carbon-fiber hard top, and a fabric soft top, the latter of which is easier to install and remove. Photo by: Pagani 
Despite losing its roof, the Huayra Roadster retains its gullwing-style doors. Photo by: Pagani 
Power comes from a Mercedes-AMG V12 engine. Photo by: Pagani 
It makes 764 horsepower and 737 pound-feet of torque. Photo by: Pagani 
Pagani promises a max cornering figure of 1.8G, which is the highest of any car equipped with road tires. Photo by: Pagani 
It'll officially debut at the Geneva Motor Show in March. Photo by: Pagani
